settings.text:
Step Into The World of Fasting
Science Backed. 20 Years of Research.

settings.code: From first time fasters to advanced fasters, we have a way to integrate fasting into your healthy lifestyle. Take a break from mindless eating, high-calorie diets, sugar, and carbs and start your fasting journey.

Step Into the World of Fasting

Science Backed. 20 Years of Research.

To deliver many of the benefits of fasting with convenience and ease with a complete 5 day Fast, while empowering you to take control of your own health

ProLon® is a 5-day dietary program carefully designed to nourish and rejuvenate your body while supporting metabolic balance. The ProLon Fasting Mimicking Diet® gives many of the benefits of a fast while letting you eat delicious food to help fight hunger and lose weight while protecting lean body mass.* Get a trimmer waistline and many of the associated benefits of fasting without requiring ongoing lifestyle changes, such as long-term dieting.

*Benefits seen when using multiple consecutive cycles of ProLon.

All ProLon purchases include a 20 minute health coach consultation — an additional $74 Value!

settings.title: Beginner
settings.description: ProLon ReSet is the only scientifically backed 1-day nutrition kit that puts your body in a fasting state, helping you take the time to reset and recharge. Take a break from mindless eating, high-calorie diets, sugar, and carbs.*
settings.subDescription: Amp up your Intermittent Fasting with a nutrition program that gives you many of the benefits of a full-day fast.

settings.title: Intermediate
settings.description: Order ProLon and you’ll discover delicious foods that help keep you energized while giving your body many of the benefits of a 5-day fast. Also receive 30ct Fast Bar to support your intermittent fasting goals after your ProLon cycle.*
settings.subDescription: With benefits of Healthy Aging and Metabolic Health, jumpstart your health journey

settings.title: Advanced
settings.description: Enjoy 5 days of Fasting Mimicking Nutrition, plus 2 1-day ReSet boxes, and 30ct Intermittent Fasting Bars, for the ultimate fasting bundle. Kick start and maintain your fasting goals all month long - enjoy great savings & greater results*
settings.subDescription: Reset With This Advanced Fasting Plan to Support Metabolic Health and Healthy Aging
